title: Building externals-uwp and externals-windows fail because of missing header files
body:
The building of "externals-uwp" and "externals-windows" fails because of missing header files. 
Occurs when running _> .\bootstrapper.ps1 -Target everything_

**Output for "externals-uwp":**
```
Executing` task: externals-uwp
Done. Made 33 targets from 21 files in 105ms
ninja: Entering directory `out/winrt/x64'
[1/967] compile ../../../src/xamarin/SkiaKeeper.c
FAILED: obj/src/xamarin/libSkiaSharp.SkiaKeeper.obj
"C:/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft Visual Studio/2017/Community/VC/Tools/MSVC/14.13.26128/bin/HostX64/x64/cl.exe" /nologo /showIncludes /FC @obj/src/xamarin/libSkiaSharp.SkiaKeeper.obj.rsp /c ../../../src/xamarin/SkiaKeeper.c /Foobj/src/xamarin/libSkiaSharp.SkiaKeeper.obj /Fd"obj/SkiaSharp_c.pdb"
c:\git\skiasharp\externals\skia\include\c\sk_types.h(15): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'stddef.h': No such file or directory
[2/967] compile ../../../src/xamarin/sk_managedpixelserializer.cpp
```
